stories.original_headline: What scientists found inside Titan was not what anyone expected
stories.original_summary: For years, scientists thought Saturn’s moon Titan hid a global ocean beneath its frozen surface. A new look at Cassini data now suggests something very different: a thick, slushy interior with pockets of liquid water rather than an open sea. A subtle delay in how Titan deforms under Saturn’s gravity
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Slushy Secret Within Distant Icy Sphere
stories.fantasy_story: For ages, the Sky-Gazers' Guild believed a vast ocean lay beneath the frozen shell of the distant icy sphere known as Titan. But new insights from enchanted looking-glasses reveal a different truth. It seems Titan's heart is a thick, slushy realm, holding many hidden pockets of liquid rather than an open sea.

stories.original_headline: This “mushroom” is not a fungus, it’s a bizarre plant that breaks all the rules
stories.original_summary: Balanophora is a plant that abandoned photosynthesis long ago and now lives entirely as a parasite on tree roots, hidden in dark forest undergrowth. Scientists surveying rare populations across East Asian islands uncovered how its cellular machinery shrank but didn't disappear, revealing unexpected
stories.fantasy_headline: Mysterious Root-Dweller: A Plant That Spurns Sunlight
stories.fantasy_story: The Botanists' Guild has documented a truly bizarre flora known as Balanophora. This strange growth long ago ceased to draw power from the sun, instead living as a root-leech, hidden deep within the forest's gloom. Wizards studying its inner workings found its magic dwindled but never vanished, revealing unexpected secrets of life.

stories.original_summary: The holidays have a way of sneaking up on us. One minute you're trick-or-treating with your kids, and the next you're panic shopping in a Buc-ee's gift aisle. But it doesn't have to be that way. With the right cheat sheet, you can keep the holiday spirit high and stress levels low. Fortunately, we d
stories.fantasy_headline: Merchants' Guild Presents: The Grand Winter Feast Gifting Scroll
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Winter Feast always seems to arrive swiftly, leaving many scrambling for gifts! Fear not, for the Merchants' Guild has compiled a most helpful Gifting Scroll. This enchanted list will guide you to wonderful treasures, ensuring joyous celebrations and much less worry.

stories.original_headline: Sony’s XM5 headphones and the latest Kindle round out this week’s best deals
stories.original_summary: If you’re feeling the stress of having procrastinated on your holiday shopping — and you missed out during Black Friday and Cyber Monday — we’ve got you. We’ve found a variety of gadgets on sale that make for great gifts, many of which will ship in time for the holidays. One of the standouts is […]
stories.fantasy_headline: Rare Deals on Wondrous Artifacts Before Winter Feast
stories.fantasy_story: For those who missed the Grand Market Days, worry not! Merchants are offering special prices on many wondrous artifacts before the Winter Feast. Find enchanted ear-muffs of supreme quiet and reading tablets that hold countless tales. These fine deals will ensure your gifts arrive in time for the celebrations.
